overview: When Montana cowpuncher Larry Benson, riding his horse Starlight and accompanied by his dog Rex, tied up at the hitching post in front of McAvoy's hotel in Dam, Texas, he had little idea of the extraordinary series of adventures that were in store for him, Starlight and Rex.
tagline: Jack Perrin is a Pole-Playing Puncher with a Mighty Punch!
title: Hi-Jacking Rustlers
